rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with Vastu alignment ensuring positive energy flow. Includes reception area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the entrance hall; designed for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern appliances and a dining alcove; positioned as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with balcony for relaxation; designed to face North for auspiciousness.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with balcony; maintains balance and privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Compact guest room designed for occasional visitors; includes a small balcony as per design consistency.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom facility with proper ventilation and privacy, aligned to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Each bedroom has a balcony with Vastu-compliant design ensuring natural light and ventilation.
